run_action.py

Contents

  • run_action.py

usage: run_action.py [-h] [--background]
                     {move,get_beliefs,move_planar,wait,reposition,switch_mode,segmentation,grasp,pick,reposition_cam,place}
                     ...

Positional Arguments

action

Possible choices: move, get_beliefs, move_planar, wait, reposition, switch_mode, segmentation, grasp, pick, reposition_cam, place

Named Arguments

--background

spin until shutdown is signaled; action is stopped then

Default: False

Sub-commands

move

Perform move

run_action.py move [-h] params

Positional Arguments

params

params to move provided as a JSON string
